Tikvesh, I'm not sure how Nero handles subtitles (you should enable them in the options if it supports it) since i never used it for playing media files, but these two players handle them very well (Bsplayer autoloads all subs when filename is the same), i recommend using one of them ;)

VLC Player: http://www.videolan.org/vlc/ 
or 
BSplayer: http://www.bsplayer.org/

Hi Great upload I have been searching for this, I started my torrent but I cant seem to make a connection is there a problem withthe seed ? is there something I can do to help ?

-Bane

Icitinuri try enabling DHT or force starting your torrent (in Azureus at least, other clients handle it differently)  PB must be having some problems with connections, but i can see there are seeders and leechers on it 2/6 at the moment, just really takes time to connect to them, which didn't happen before or on other trackers...
Thank you so much for the upload. To add, this is a superb video quality + U gave us the subs! Thanx and please keep on bringing us rare movies as this one!

Thankyou for this. I have it on VHS. I don't understand it, which makes me want to watch it over and over, but I just think it is a beautiful and relaxing painting. My rule is; if it has less seeds then it will be a great movie; I haven't been wrong yet. I will seed this forever.
